panels.description: The "recent cpu usage" of the system the application is running in
panels.title: System CPU Usage

panels.description: The "recent cpu usage" for the Java Virtual Machine process
panels.title: Process CPU Usage

panels.description: The amount of used memory; The amount of memory in bytes that is committed for the Java virtual machine to use; The maximum amount of memory in bytes that can be used for memory management;
panels.title: JVM Heap

panels.description: The current number of live threads including both daemon and non-daemon threads
panels.title: Thread Count

panels.description: The number of core-actions - from the point of view of the backend-application.
panels.title: Application Action Count

panels.description: The time it takes for core-actions to complete - from the point of view of the backend-application.
panels.title: Application Action Times

panels.description: The number of query-actions - from the point of view of the backend-application.
panels.title: Application Query Count

panels.description: The time it takes for queries to complete - from the point of view of the backend-application.
panels.title: Application Query Times

panels.description: Total number of AQL queries finished.
panels.title: Queries

panels.description: Total memory limit for all AQL queries combined; Total memory usage of all AQL queries currently executing. The granularity of this metric is steps of 32768 bytes
panels.title: Query Memory Usage
